title: Alerts
description: Alerts provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions.

subsection.title: Variants
subsection.description: To use just pass the type prop with the message prop, to be displayed inside the alert. This affects the color scheme. Alert supports primary, secondary, success, danger and warning types.

examples.message: A primary alert example with a text
